++ Git How To Undo Changes To A File

  GitHowToUndoChangesToASingleFile

+++ SEARCH
  Git undo file undo file git git revert file revert file in git
  
+++ SUMMARY

  * Revert (reset) *uncomitted*/*local* changes:

        $ git checkout -- <file>

  * Revert (reset) a single file to a specific revision:

        $ git checkout <commit_hash> -- <file>
